verses.roman:
sabā lañā kailā prabhu guṇḍicā-mārjana
sabā lañā kailā prabhu vanya-bhojana

synonyms: sabā lañā—taking all of them; kailā—performed; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; guṇḍicā-mārjana—washing of the Guṇḍicā temple; sabā lañā—with all of them; kailā—performed; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya; vanya-bhojana—eating in the garden.
translation: As He had previously done, He cleansed the Guṇḍicā temple and held a picnic feast in the garden with the devotees.
